channel.title: CVE Feed for KlbTheme -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for KlbTheme -- all products

item.title: CVE-2023-49839|2024-08-06T18:32:35.120Z -- klbtheme -- cosmetsy%20theme%20%28core%20plugin%29
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in KlbTheme Cosmetsy theme (core plugin), KlbTheme Partdo theme (core plugin), KlbTheme Bacola theme (core plugin), KlbTheme Medibazar theme (core plugin), KlbTheme Furnob theme (core plugin), KlbTheme Clotya theme (core plugin) allows Reflected XSS.This issue affects Cosmetsy theme (core plugin): from n/a through 1.3.0; Partdo theme (core plugin): from n/a through 1.0.9; Bacola theme (core plugin): from n/a through 1.3.3; Medibazar theme (core plugin): from n/a through 1.2.3; Furnob theme (core plugin): from n/a through 1.1.7; Clotya theme (core plugin): from n/a through 1.1.5.

item.title: CVE-2023-49838|2024-08-02T22:01:26.121Z -- klbtheme -- clotya%20theme
item.description: Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in KlbTheme Clotya theme, KlbTheme Cosmetsy theme, KlbTheme Furnob theme, KlbTheme Bacola theme, KlbTheme Partdo theme, KlbTheme Medibazar theme, KlbTheme Machic theme.This issue affects Clotya theme: from n/a through 1.1.6; Cosmetsy theme: from n/a through 1.7.7; Furnob theme: from n/a through 1.2.2; Bacola theme: from n/a through 1.3.3; Partdo theme: from n/a through 1.1.1; Medibazar theme: from n/a through 1.8.6; Machic theme: from n/a through 1.2.8.
